channel.title: Why!?
channel.description:
Why do spirit shields cost soo much now?
Didnt they used to be like 50m?
And the price just goes up to like 500m...

item.title: Why!?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Spades:

I’ve had a Dfs, it was nothing special. I prefer Dragon Defender. That is my personal opinion.

Obviously not. When charged it gives +1 more strength than a dragon defender, and all those nice defense bonuses.

Read full topic

item.title: Why!?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

I believe divine has like a 30% damage absorb, then add on your barrows or shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Why!?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

The only ones that cost that much are elysian and divine; the others cost about 1/10 of them G.E. price…but people were buying them for 1b street last time I checked. I’ve gotten a spectral off of lootshare corp.

Read full topic

item.title: Why!?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“riku9182, post:13, topic:382511”][quote author=Spades link=topic=478305.msg3500835#msg3500835 date=1297724748]

I almost bought a Spectral for 50mil yesterday

Spectral is shit. If you are going to get a Spirit shield get a Divine. Arcane for max mage, if you mage a lot. Otherwise they are pointless shields. I do fine with my Rune/Dragon Defender.
[/quote]
Excuse me for not wanting to spend 100mil+
Tbh Defender’s are shit. DFS is the way to go[/quote]

I’ve had a Dfs, it was nothing special. I prefer Dragon Defender. That is my personal opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: Why!?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:7, topic:382511”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=478305.msg3500615#msg3500615 date=1297708330]

It always was very expensive (street price wise).

i used to see them selling around 50-90m… on street :o
[/quote]

That must of been a private server. They started out high, they are high.[/quote]
i think i know the difference between world 2 ge and “WE H4Z SP1R1T SHI3LD$ 4ND $1UFF FURST O3N 1N G4TS 3DMEN!!!OEN!!!”

Read full topic

item.title: Why!?
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

I just go corp beast and get 1 everyday /jk

Just Corp. I wouldn’t even bother saving up for a spirit shield.

item.description:

i used to see them selling around 50-90m… on street :o[/quote]

item.title: Why!?
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:5, topic:382511”][quote author=IlikeArrays link=topic=478305.msg3500645#msg3500645 date=1297710941]
Because one of them can inflict 33% damage or whatever so if the monster hits 99 you only see 66 which is great for boss hunting. I don’t have them memorized but yea the have special abilities. Oh and kill that one monster to get them is a pain in the ass so drops are rare.
[/quote]
Are you serious?!?!?

And i thought torva was overpowered…

Lets see…

Torva + Any spirit shield plus chaotic/vesta longsword = gf all??[/quote]

Haha if you could have that setup then yea. GF all.

Read full topic
